short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to estimate the time to read a Wikipedia article

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wikipace is a simple and unobtrusive extension that simply adds the estimated time to read below the articles title.

To get started, just install, and whenever you open a Wikipedia page, you will notice a small text below the title stating the estimated reading time!
